name: Up Valley: Color Challenge
description:
*Up Valley : Color Challenge is a small arcade game for all who have loved Color & Pattern matching games!

*Tap a bar with the same Cube color to raise the bar UP and let it hit your cube to get score !
*The Cube will change color to the next platform so it can go higher and faster!
*You must follow the color pattern of Cube to push it higher.
*Concentration and focusing skill is required to play this game.
